price: (ابراهيم -علیه السلام-) وويل: په حقيقت كې تاسو او پلرونه مو (ټول) په څرګند بې لارې توب كې ياست.
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
